subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] BPJ's roposal for QS-SAMPA ligatures and half-letters
msgSnippet: ... Paige, Have you seen my keyboard proposal? I know that you had complained that you had to type a j in order to get Yo-yo. My proposal has it so you type
messageBody:
pgabhart wrote:
>
>
> I don't see any more difficulty with reading the half-w and wh letters
> than any of the others. Again, I believe it is just practice that makes
> the difference, Moira.
>

Paige,

Have you seen my keyboard proposal? I know that you had complained that
you had to type a "j" in order to get Yo-yo. My proposal has it so you
type a "j" for Judge, an "I" for Ice, and a "y" for Yo-yo.

Paul
